meanings.sent1: Oys! I can't believe I forgot my homework!
meanings.sent2: She exclaimed 'oys!' when she saw the mess in her room.
meanings.sent3: Oys, I accidentally spilled my juice all over the table!
meanings.sent4: The loud thunder made her shout 'oys!' in fear.
meanings.sent5: As the magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, the audience gasped 'oys!' in amazement.

meanings.definition: A Yiddish exclamation of pain or frustration.
meanings.sent1: He let out a loud 'oys' when he stubbed his toe.
meanings.sent2: The old man's constant 'oys' could be heard throughout the house.
meanings.sent3: Every time she lost a game, she would mutter 'oys' under her breath.
meanings.sent4: The 'oys' from the kitchen signaled that dinner was burning.
meanings.sent5: The actor's dramatic 'oys' echoed through the theater, conveying deep emotion.
